summary: Water quality is stable but temperature is lower than average, which may affect plant growth.

insights.recommendation: Maintain pH around 7.0-7.5 for optimal tilapia health.
Monitor TDS; ensure it stays within 300-500 ppm for healthy plant growth.
Consider increasing water temperature to around 25-28°C for better growth rates.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.034 / 7.007 / 7.106 (trend: down)
• TDS avg/min/max: 330.957 / 307.8 / 340.6 ppm (trend: up)
• Temp avg/min/max: 24.979 / 21.31 / 29.62 °C (trend: down)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
